Commands.MainPageCommandd: select top 20 x-forwarded-for as clientip, cs(referer) as url, count(*) as hits INTO main.xml from {0} where cs(referer) = 'https://www.cruclub.ru/' group by clientip, url order by hits desc
Commands.OfferPageCommand: select top 20 x-forwarded-for as clientip, cs(referer) as url, count(*) as hits INTO order.xml from {0} where cs(referer) like '%offers%' group by clientip, url order by hits desc
